text: Amphisbaena metallurga is a species of worm lizard found in Brazil. ==References== metallurga Category:Reptiles described in 2015 Category:Taxa named by Henrique Caldeira Costa Category:Taxa named by Flávia C. Resende Category:Taxa named by Mauro Teixeira Jr. Category:Taxa named by Francisco Dal Vechio Category:Taxa named by Cinara A. Clemente Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Amphisbaena metallurga
